Estimate maximum a posterior (MAP) mean¶

usage: vc_map_mean [-h] [-a A] [-l L] -seqs SEQS -y YS -vars VARS

Named Arguments¶

-a

size of alphabet

-l

sequence length

-seqs

list of sequences

-y

vector of phenotypic measurements

-vars

vector of noise variances
